game.name: ENDALOR
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: ENDALOR는 1-4인용 중세 다크 판타지 서바이벌 RPG입니다. 어둡고 잔인하며 신비한 Endalor 땅을 탐험하고, 생존하고, 건설하고, 만들고, 싸우고, 정복하십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An immersive medieval dark fantasy survival game with RPG elements for 1-4 players. Set in a hand crafted open world. Explore, survive, build, craft, fight and conquer your way through the dark, brutal and mysterious lands.
